alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Tippah; Union; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, northern Yalobusha, northwestern Calhoun, western Union, northwestern Pontotoc, southeastern Marshall and southwestern Tippah Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cambridge to near Paris to near Velma. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, New Albany, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, Bruce, Coffeeville, Cambridge, Randolph, Etta, Banner, Bethlehem, Tula, Denmark, Pinedale, Velma, Paris, Thaxton, Myrtle, Abbeville and Taylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Tippah; Union; Yalobusha
